en: Are you aware that you're being a nuisance?
zh: 你知道你正在成为一个麻烦吗？

en: There haven't been many movies like this recently.
zh: 最近没有太多像这样的电影。

en: "It's been a while since we had a serious conversation, eh." "That's for sure. We usually only have idiotic conversations."
zh: “我们很久没有认真谈过了，是吧。”“那是当然。我们通常只进行愚蠢的对话。”

en: Well, what shall we do for fun today...
zh: 嗯，我们今天做什么好玩呢...

en: They aren't just any 3-D glasses.
These aren't just any 3-D glasses.
It's cold outside, so he came inside the room.
zh: 外面很冷，所以他进屋了。

en: "Je t'aime" means "I love you" in French.
zh: “Je t'aime”在法语中是“我爱你”的意思。

en: I'm so tired I could die.
Can I have your full name?
Is it ok if you wait just a little while?
Has anything been unclear so far?
zh: 到目前为止，有什么不清楚的地方吗？

en: It looks like that, huh?
Well, this is the street!
I'll go if it's fun.
At this point, there's nowhere left to go!
zh: 到了这个地步，已经无路可走了！

en: He's a thief, isn't he?
You're a thief, aren't you?
You're thieves, aren't you?
She's a thief, isn't she?
They are thieves, aren't they?
There is definetly a safe route!
I thought it was something like this. I tried to come because I was worried.
zh: 我就觉得是这样。因为担心，所以试着来了。

en: Who are you calling stupid?!
Ow! Stop it!
The wind sure is cold.
The bus now arriving is going to Domestic Terminal 1. Passengers for the International Terminal, please wait. The shuttle bus to the International Terminal also leaves from this stop.
zh: 现在进站的这辆巴士是开往国内航站楼1号航站楼的。前往国际航站楼的乘客请稍候。前往国际航站楼的班车也从这个车站出发。

en: The bus now arriving is going to the International Terminal via Domestic Terminal 1.
zh: 现在进站的这辆巴士经由国内航站楼1号航站楼开往国际航站楼。

en: We are bound for Domestic terminal 1. We will not be making any stops at the International terminal, so please take care.
zh: 我们是开往国内航站楼1号航站楼的。我们不会在国际航站楼停靠，请注意。

en: I guess I'll just do some homework by my lonely self or something...
zh: 我还是自己一个人做作业什么的吧...

en: Tom left through the back door.
You shouldn't be so prideful.
You should suppress your pride.
Why does she hate you so much?
You can save your life and your family lives by always preparing for earthquakes.
zh: 通过时刻为地震做好准备，你可以拯救你和你家人的生命。

en: What are you piddle-farting around for? I could do that in 10 minutes.
zh: 你磨磨蹭蹭地干什么呢？我十分钟就能搞定。

en: "Do you know what floppy disks are?" "Of course I do!" "Have you ever used one?" "Nah, I haven't."
zh: “你知道什么是软盘吗？”“我当然知道！”“你用过吗？”“没，我没用过。”

en: The eruption of the volcano Vesuvius destroyed the city of Pompeii.
zh: 维苏威火山的爆发摧毁了庞贝城。

en: Love alone is not enough for a successful international marriage.
zh: 单单有爱不足以成就一段成功的跨国婚姻。

en: Love alone isn't enough for a successful international marriage.
zh: 光有爱不足以成就一段成功的跨国婚姻。

en: We planted rice.
We stayed at a farm house.
We helped on the farm.
We went to a firework festival.
"Can I ask you for a bit of a favor?" "It depends on what the favor is."
zh: “我可以请你帮个小忙吗？”“那要看是什么忙了。”

en: Please sit as close to the front as possible.
Did you read this morning's newspaper?
zh: 你读了今天的报纸了吗？

en: Could you please briefly introduce yourself?
zh: 请您简单地自我介绍一下好吗？

en: First of all, please do a simple self-introduction.
zh: 首先，请做一个简单的自我介绍。

en: That isn't wine. It's grape juice.
zh: 那不是葡萄酒。那是葡萄汁。

en: So thin! Are you dieting?
Wow! You've lost weight. Are you on a diet?
Obviously not!
That sounds like fun, doesn't it?
Oh no! It looks like someone is crying.
It'd be nice if tomorrow never came.
zh: 如果明天永远不会到来就好了。

en: You don't have to worry about something like that.
zh: 你不用担心那样的事情。

en: If there's some way to enjoy studying, could you teach me how?
zh: 如果有什么方法可以享受学习，你能教教我吗？

en: Is it OK if I drink all of this?
zh: 我把这些都喝了可以吗？
